column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police are continuing the hunt for two men who shot up a Toul Kork cafe on ------September 27
column4: 2019.------It has been widely reported that the suspects are Chinese nationals
column5: who were shooting at another group of Chinese
column6: firing off three gunshots at “Green Coffee” restaurant and coffee shop in Sangkat Teuk Laak II 2 Khan Toul Kork
column7: Phnom Penh. There was damage to the windows
column8: but not injuries.------Through two eyewitnesses and a security camera scan at the scene
column9: the cops are trying to identify the two men who carried out the shooting.------Authorities said the suspects have not been identified yet
column10: but escaped in a silver Highlander. ------AREY NEWS
